channel.title: User's Guide on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in User's Guide on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Convert One File
item.description: One of the most common tasks that users use Aspose.Cells for, is converting individual files. Converting Individual Files To convert a particular document in a document library: Select Convert with Aspose.Cells.SharePoint in the document’s Edit Control Block (ECB). **Selecting “Convert via Aspose.Cells” item in the document’s ECB ** The conversion settings screen is displayed. Here, you can fine-tune the conversion: Select the destination file format from the Convert to list.

item.title: Convert Multiple Files
item.description: To convert all files in a folder: Select Convert with Aspose.Cells from the ECB of your desired folder while staying in the parent. To convert multiple files: Select several files in the library and select Convert with Aspose.Cells. **Convert all files in the sub-folder ** Select the file item in the document list and move it up or down change the conversion order. **Changing the conversion order **

item.title: Preview Document
item.description: To preview a Microsoft Excel document in the document library: Select Preview Document with Aspose.Cells from the document’s Edit Control Block (ECB). **Selecting Preview Document from the menu ** **Document preview ** Attachments: preview1.png (image/png) preview2.png (image/png)

item.title: Preview Multiple Documents
item.description: You may preview multiple Excel documents in the document library. To preview all the files in a folder: Select Preview Document with Aspose.Cells in the ECB for your desired folder while staying in the parent. To preview multiple files from within a folder: Select multiple files. With the files still selected, select Preview Document with Aspose.Cells. **Document preview from withing SharePoint ** When you’re previewing several documents, the data area shows the first document in the list.

item.title: Searching in a Document
item.description: To search all the files in a folder: Select Search in Document with Aspose.Cells in the ECB of the desired folder while staying in the parent. To search several files at once: Select multiple files. With the files still selected, select Search Document with Aspose.Cells. **Searching documents ** The following options are available: Find Options: Focus your search by searching in cells, for formulas, or finding formulas that contains a specific expression.

item.title: Add Watermark to a document
item.description: If you want to add watermark in an Excel file, please choose “Add WaterMark with Aspose.Cells” option in the document’s Edit Control Block (ECB). The following options are available during the add watermark setup: Watermark file The file must be an image file. Attachments: add_watermark1.png (image/png) add_watermark2.png (image/png)

item.title: Add Footer to a document
item.description: If you want to add footer in an Excel file, please choose “Add Footer with Aspose.Cells” option in the document’s Edit Control Block (ECB). The following options are available during the add footer setup: Section Add footer position: Left Section, Center Section, Right Section. Footer Script It represents Footer formatting script. Script commands: Command | Description| &P Current page number| &N Page count|&D Current date| &T Current time &A Sheet name &F File name without path &“” Font name, for example: &“Arial” &“, ” Font name and font style, for example: &“Arial,Bold” & Font size.

item.title: Add Footer to multiple documents
item.description: If you want to add footer in multiple Excel files, please choose “Add Footer with Aspose.Cells” option in Ribbon bar. \ Get all Excel files from data source folder and create file list table. Select file which needs to add footer, click Add Footer button to add footer for selected files. \ The following options are available during adding footer setup: Section Add footer position: Left Section, Center Section and Right Section.

item.title: Add Watermark to multiple documents
item.description: If you want to add watermark in multiple Excel files, please choose “Add WaterMark with Aspose.Cells” option in the Ribbon bar. \ Get all Excel files from data source folder and create file list table. Select file which needs to add watermark, click Add Watermark button to add watermark for the selected files. \ \ The following options are available during the add water mark setup: Watermark file: ** Input image file path.
